Episodes.Title: Life, Loss, Leaving
Episodes.Plot: As Bette desperately begs for Tina's forgiveness, Tina herself is hiding a shocking secret from Bette and all her friends. Alice and Dana continue to hide their romantic trysts from the others, and Jenny finds herself saying goodbye to Tim as he prepares to leave.
Episodes.GuestStars: Luciana Carro, Cassandra Sawtell, Alison Matthews, Angela Bohn, Lydia Castro, Debra Donohue, Nina Pousette, Brenda Crichlow, Tygh Runyan, Matty Finochio, Eric Mabius, Arianna Huffington

Episodes.Title: Lap Dance
Episodes.Plot: Acting on Alice's advice, Tina decides to hire a famous lawyer. Dana and Alice struggle to stay away from each other, Ivan gives Kit the cold shoulder, and Jenny decides to have a serious discussion with Robin regarding their relationship.
Episodes.GuestStars: Luvia Petersen,  Rosette Sharma,  Katie Ritchie,  Debora Cohen,  Shelby Stocks,  Barclay Hope,  Jill Christensen,  Fabrice Grover,  Graeme Duffy,  Francine Cohen,  Dena Robb,  Crystal Lowe,  Kirsten Williamson,

Episodes.Title: Loneliest Number
Episodes.Plot: When she is rejected from the writing class, Jenny sets out to win over her intimidating professor. Tina is devastated when she finds an email from Candace on Bette's computer, Dana and Alice continue to hide their attraction for each other, and Kit tries to find an opening act for her new club.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tony Abatemarco,  Fabrice Grover,  Peter Shinkoda,  Michael Karl Richards,  Samantha Banton,  Barclay Hope,  Gary Jones,  Tony Salvatore,  Elizabeth Ziff,  Ted

Episodes.Title: Lynch Pin
Episodes.Plot: Bette travels to New York on a business trip. Tina is shocked and angry about her lawyer's true intentions. Jenny and Shane search for a new roommate, and Kit bonds with an inspirational speaker.
Episodes.GuestStars: Daniela Buzzi,  Cassandra Sawtell,  Heather Douglas,  Audra Ricketts,  Gina Holden,  Joe Towne,  Sam Easton,  Tina Milo Milivojevic,  Zoran Vukelic,  Julie Patzwald,  Matthew McInnis,  Sarah Lind,  Marnie Robins

Episodes.Title: Labyrinth
Episodes.Plot: Bette tries to fix her relationship with Tina, but she gets a rude awakening with some bad news both at home and work. Alice and Dana try taking their relationship to a different level, Shane starts her new job as a PA to Veronica Bloom (guest star Camryn Manheim), and Jenny gets some confidence from her new hairstyle.
Episodes.GuestStars: Marsha Regis,  Kim  Paris,  Ruth Nichol,  Terence Kelly,  Bruce James,  Josephine  Jacob,  Monique Ganderton,  Jeff  Ellingson,  Wendy Morrow Donaldson,  Gina Doty,  Sefton Fincham,  Alisen Down,  Kyle J. Downes

Episodes.Title: Lagrimas de Oro
Episodes.Plot: Alice pushes Dana to break up with Tonya, but Dana isn't prepared for when Tonya reveals her own secret. Tina considers her new attraction to Helena, Kit finally hooks up with Benjamin, and Jenny and Carmen continue to enjoy each other's company.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bob Glouberman,  Stefanie Von Pfetten,  Vangelis Stoudis,  Chris William Martin,  Heather Douglas,  Leanne Adachi,  Melissa Rivers

Episodes.Title: Luminous
Episodes.Plot: Shane tries to dull her pain in the hopes that she can forget about Carmen and Jenny's blossoming relationship. Tina comes between Helena and her ex over the custody of their kids and offers a glimmer of hope to Bette. Dana and Alice call everyone to The Planet to announce their new relationship.
Episodes.GuestStars: Camille Sullivan,  Mackenzie Gray,  Jordan Medina,  Kyle J. Downes,  Alyson Palmer,  Sharon Isbin,  Fabrice Grover,  Cobie Smulders,  Dan Wynands,  Tamiko Whitsett,  Elias Lucero,  Sophie Holt,  Matt McColm,  Chr

Episodes.Title: Loyal
Episodes.Plot: When Alice runs into her ex, she is surprised to find out that she is now dating Dana's ex-girlfriend. Bette and Tina reach an agreement over their relationship, Jenny is worried that she may have lost a writing job, and Shane finds some comfort in a church.
Episodes.GuestStars: Christopher Shyer,  David Richmond-Peck,  Brendan Penny,  Dion Luther,  Sarah Hayward,  Michelle Harrison,  Guy Demong,  Pablo Coffey,  Warren Christie,  Eileen Bui,  Cameron MacDonald,  Guinevere Turner,  Sara

Episodes.Title: Late, Later, Latent
Episodes.Plot: Dana is stunned when Alice requests a bold sexual favor from her. Burr Connor (guest star Tony Goldwyn) reveals a secret to Jenny. Jenny learns about Carmen's real feelings for Shane, Kit plans a romantic night for Benjamin, and Bette and Tina have an intimate encounter as they bond over their unborn baby.
Episodes.GuestStars: Roy Duquette,  Lori Ann Triolo,  David Richmond-Peck,  Mikela J. Mikael,  Kelly-Ruth Mercier,  Tammy Hui,  Agam Darshi,  Graem Beddoes,  Judith Maxie,  Daryl Shuttleworth,  Camryn Manheim,  Tony Goldwyn

Episodes.Title: Land Ahoy
Episodes.Plot: A lesbian cruise in the Caribbean proves eventful for Dana, Alice, Shane, Jenny and Carmen. Bette and Kit struggle to reconcile with their estranged father, Melvin, during his visit.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sylvia Rhue,  Preston Cook,  Jeremy Crittenden,  Joy Walker,  Amy Ziff,  Angela Uyeda,  Daryl Shuttleworth,  Sara Botsford,  Torie Osborn,  Shawn Colvin,  Saskia Gould,  Kelly Parks,  Ronald Selmour,  Tosca Baggo

Episodes.Title: Loud & Proud
Episodes.Plot: Dana is stunned when she learns a big secret about her brother, Howie, at Gay Pride 2005. Mark tries to make amends with Jenny and Shane, Kit and Bette learn that their father, Melvin, is refusing treatment for his illness, and a shocking memory about Jenny's childhood is revealed.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tyler Johnston,  Linda Ko,  Victoria Billingsley,  Heather Doerksen,  Omari Forrester,  Stephen Aberle,  Andrew Francis,  Gina Stockdale,  Carrie Fleming,  Jenn Forgie,  Cobie Smulders,  Brad Dryborough,  Iris P

Episodes.Title: L'Chaim
Episodes.Plot: Bette reaches out to Tina as she decides to take her father home for his final days. Jenny struggles after recalling a difficult memory from her childhood, and Alice becomes jealous when Dana agrees to have dinner with her ex-girlfriend, Lara.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cobie Smulders,  Sonya Salomaa,  Linda Ko,  Emily Holmes,  Peaches,  Don Thompson,  Ryan Booth,  Jenn Forgie,  Ossie Davis

Episodes.Title: Lacuna
Episodes.Plot: A surprise guest shows up at a sad event as Bette gets stunning news about her job. Tina goes into a surprisingly difficult labor, Jenny finally reaches breaking point over her painful childhood memory, Alice struggles with her jealousy, and Peggy Peabody lays down the laws with her daughter, Helena.
Episodes.GuestStars: Nadine States,  Candus Churchill,  Georgia Craig,  Lovie Eli,  Marcus Mosely,  Will Sanders,  Debbie Shair,  Michael Inez,  Craig Bartock,  Tom Pickett,  Ann Wilson,  Benjamin Smith,  Ted
